survey_brief: This survey aims to assess student and faculty participation in, and satisfaction with, the campus recycling program to identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How often do you use the recycling bins on campus?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure mobile-friendly dropdown for answer options.

script.question_text: How often do you use the recycling bins on campus?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: Which types of materials do you typically recycle on campus? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for respondents who answered 'Always', 'Often', or 'Sometimes' to Q1.
questions.client_notes: Multi-select options. Include 'Other' with a text field if needed.

script.question_text: Which types of materials do you typically recycle on campus? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: This question appears for respondents who answered 'Always', 'Often', or 'Sometimes' to Q1.

questions.question_text: What barriers prevent you from using the campus recycling program?
answer_options: Lack of awareness about the program
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for respondents who answered 'Rarely' or 'Never' to Q1.
questions.client_notes: Include an optional open-text field for 'Other' responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: multi-choice with optional open-text.
